trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around August 24th 2009
Summary: Bright light right behind the tip of the mountain
divs: sighting detailsi was driving west on the way to a friend's house and noticed a beautiful bright light off to the side of the usual light on top of pike peak. it was a ginormous-looking fireball\light...but moving very slowly. but as i drove more a couple blocks, it disappeared behind the mountain. it was amazing and not like anything else i've seen. i've been looking all over news websites hoping there was some kind of explanation, but i am happy to see someone else had reported this on this website today.
